soen6441.team01.warzone.controller

Class ControllerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.controller.ControllerFactory

  • public class ControllerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Software Factory design pattern to manage the set of objects that define the respective classes for the different Warzone controllers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControllerFactory(ModelFactory p_models, ViewFactory p_view_factory)
      Constructor with views defined.

      static ControllerFactory CreateWarzoneBasicConsoleGameControllers(ModelFactory p_model, ViewFactory p_view)
      Helper function that creates a software factory that holds the Warzone controller objects for the console version of the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControllerFactory

        public ControllerFactory(ModelFactory p_models,
                         ViewFactory p_view_factory)
        Constructor with views defined. Views passed as null will result in the default view being passed back.
        Parameters:
        p_models - the software factory for all the game models
        p_view_factory - the software factory for all the views

    • Method Detail

      • CreateWarzoneBasicConsoleGameControllers

        public static ControllerFactory CreateWarzoneBasicConsoleGameControllers(ModelFactory p_model,
                                                                         ViewFactory p_view)
        Helper function that creates a software factory that holds the Warzone controller objects for the console version of the game.
        Parameters:
        p_model - the model software factory to use
        p_view - the view software factory to use
        Returns:
        newly create Warzone view software factory
